name: @standalone/paima-batcher
author: Paima Studios
description: Paima Engine batcher standalone, aka executable binary wrapper around the Paima Engine batcher.

scripts.build:binary: npm run build && pkg packaged/batcherCorePacked.js --options "experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json && ./scripts/post_build.sh
scripts.build:dev-binary: npm run build:dev-binary-macos && npm run build:dev-binary-linux && ./scripts/post_build.sh
scripts.build:dev-binary-macos: npm run build && pkg-dev packaged/batcherCorePacked.js --output packaged/@standalone/dev-paima-batcher-macos -t node20-macos-x64 -b --options "inspect,experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
scripts.build:dev-binary-linux: npm run build && pkg-dev packaged/batcherCorePacked.js --output packaged/@standalone/dev-paima-batcher-linux -t node20-linux-x64 -b --options "inspect,experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
scripts.build:standalone: npm run pack && npm run build:binary
scripts.build:dev-standalone: npm run install-binaries && npm run build:dev-binary
